# Tender Announcement

## Title: Elder Services

### Tender Reference Number: cb-739-36219955

### Amendment Number: 1

### Solicitation Number: 21801-23-0093

### Publication Date: 2023-09-07

### Tender Closing Date: 2023-09-25T17:00:00

### Amendment Date: 2023-09-25

### Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-27

### Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

### Tender Status: Expired

## Description

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) invites eligible suppliers to submit a statement of capabilities for the provision of Elder Services to Indigenous offenders.

The term Elder includes any person recognized by the Indigenous community as having knowledge and understanding of the traditional culture, ceremonies, protocols, teachings, and healing techniques.

The provider will be required to:

* Provide spiritual services and cultural teachings to Indigenous offenders
* Assist offenders in their healing journey to develop an understanding of traditional Indigenous culture
* Provide guidance and advice to staff and management on Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices
* Participate in case conferences and provide case management services
* Attend regional and national meetings and provide advice on Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices

The provider must meet the following criteria:

* Be recognized as an Elder or Cultural Advisor within their community
* Have a minimum of five years of experience in delivering spiritual and cultural services and teachings to Indigenous people
* Have experience in conducting ceremonies focused on healing
* Be familiar with and able to provide guidance on protocols surrounding traditional medicines and spiritual effects

## Contract Details

* Contract Period: 6 months and 4 days, from September 27, 2023 to March 31, 2024, with an option to extend for an additional one-year period
* Estimated Value: $123,360.85 (GST/HST extra)

## Eligibility

This tender is set-aside for an Indigenous Supplier in accordance with the Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). Suppliers must meet the definition of an Indigenous business as defined in the PSIB.

## Closing Date and Time

The closing date and time for acceptance of statements of capabilities is September 25, 2023 at 2:00 PM PST.
